segments.text: Good morning . Ru Via Hotel , Room Reservation . Can I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . This is Peter calling from New York , I have to change the date of reservation .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How and in whose name has the reservation been made ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: By telephone and in my name .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Please wait a moment . I'll check it in the computer . Thanks for your waiting . You've booked 10 standard rooms for trade negotiation for March 5th , 6th and 7th , is it correct ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Right , but the negotiation has been postponed until 5th to 7th of April . Do you think it's possible for us to change the reservation ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let me check the reservation list . Fortunately , we have just 10 standard rooms available for the three days .
segments.speaker: S1
